languages.text: "Ксеноса заковать в кандалы и держать в тюрьме до прибытия моего корабля".
"Shackle the xenos and keep him imprisoned until my ship arrives."
languages.original_text: "Ксеноса заковать в кандалы и держать в тюрьме до прибытия моего корабля".

traits.locale_text: "Shackle the xenos and keep him imprisoned until my ship arrives."
"Shackle the xenos and keep him imprisoned until my ship arrives."

languages.text: “把这个异形铐起来，关到笼子里，直到我的飞船抵达为止。”
languages.original_text: "Shackle the xenos and keep him imprisoned until my ship arrives."

traits.locale_text: “把这个异形铐起来，关到笼子里，直到我的飞船抵达为止。”

languages.text: 「異種族を拘束し、私の船が着くまで禁錮しておけ」
languages.original_text: "Shackle the xenos and keep him imprisoned until my ship arrives."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族を拘束し、私の船が着くまで禁錮しておけ」

languages.text: «Ate al xenos y téngalo vigilado hasta que llegue mi nave».
languages.original_text: "Shackle the xenos and keep him imprisoned until my ship arrives."

traits.locale_text: «Ate al xenos y téngalo vigilado hasta que llegue mi nave».

languages.text: "Fesselt den Xenos und haltet ihn gefangen, bis mein Schiff eintrifft."
languages.original_text: "Shackle the xenos and keep him imprisoned until my ship arrives."

traits.locale_text: "Fesselt den Xenos und haltet ihn gefangen, bis mein Schiff eintrifft."

languages.text: « Enchaînez le xénos et gardez-le en cellule jusqu'à l'arrivée de mon vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "Shackle the xenos and keep him imprisoned until my ship arrives."

traits.locale_text: « Enchaînez le xénos et gardez-le en cellule jusqu'à l'arrivée de mon vaisseau. »

languages.text: "Zenoyu zincirle. Gemim gelene kadar tutsak kalsın."
languages.original_text: "Shackle the xenos and keep him imprisoned until my ship arrives."

traits.locale_text: "Zenoyu zincirle. Gemim gelene kadar tutsak kalsın."
